body:
First off, I know that 99% of the people reading this, especially the mods, won't give a shit about this post, but thats not the point. 

I just wanted to make a goodbye post, and before people call me a baby for leaving after being demoted, be quiet.

I was demoted earlier today  (being too strict), and of course, I got mad. I realized how silly I have been, my entire life, getting mad at a video game. That's kinda sad. It made me realize what humanity has come too.

I also realized that I take this way to seriously. I realized that this is a VIDEO GAME. None of this shit is going to matter in two years, life will move on. This will all be forgotten.

If this server still exist in a year or two, I might come back just for the laughs.

Thanks to my "mentors".

AwarriorVenom <3

Koodalord <3

Herobrine683752 <3  
 
SomeonedoesMC <3

JUBBINATOR <3

calwhovian <3

steven5703 <3

and finally IvyCode <3

It's been real guys. Keep it real.
 
It is so hard to leave—until you leave. And then it is the easiest goddamned thing in the world. And I realized that there's a big difference between deciding to leave and knowing where to go.

replies.body:
"I also realized that I take this way to seriously. I realized that this is a VIDEO GAME. None of this shit is going to matter in two years, life will move on. This will all be forgotten"

Yeah it will only be forgotten if you want to forget it. 

And life is only temporary too. Eventually, it won't matter, and whatever remains of video games will move on.  

What's wrong with taking it seriously? It's a video game? So what? It's part of your life, too and you take your life seriously.
